Package cvut.fel.cz.pjv.model

Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
cvut.fel.cz.pjv.model.Simulation
public class Simulation extends Object
Represents a simulation of people. Manages the movement, collisions and states of the people in the simulation.

    Constructs a Simulation object with the specified pane and population size.

      public Simulation(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane, int population)
      Constructs a Simulation object with the specified pane and population size.
      Parameters:
      pane - The pane to display the simulation.
      population - The number of people in the simulation.

    • checkCollisions

      public void checkCollisions()
      Checks for collisions between people in the simulation. Handles the direction changes.

      Updates the recovery status of the people in the simulation.

    • saveConfig

      public void saveConfig(List<Person> people, String filename, javafx.scene.control.Slider sliderPopulationSize, javafx.scene.control.Slider sliderRecoverySpeed, javafx.scene.control.Slider sliderMovingSpeed)
      Saves the configuration of the people in the simulation to a file.
      Parameters:
      people - The list of people to save.
      filename - The name of the file.
      sliderPopulationSize - The population size slider.
      sliderRecoverySpeed - The recovery speed slider.
      sliderMovingSpeed - The moving speed slider.
